comments.body:
nit: no braces on the inner if

Also, presumably you should break out of the inner loop if you yield?

> nit: no braces on the inner if

Done.

> Also, presumably you should break out of the inner loop if you yield?

The intention here is to find all hit-testable elements. Then it's up to the test to decide what to do with them. If a test only cares about the first element, it can be achieved by `finder.hitTestable().first`.
Oh wait, the _inner_ loop! Yes, you are right. Done.
